LanguageData.GR_ChickenlodonEggUnfertilized.label: chickenlodon egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenlodonEggUnfertilized.descripti: Unfertilized chickenlodon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.GR_ChickenlodonEggFertilized.label: chickenlodon egg (fert.)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenlodonEggFertilized.description: Fertilized chickenlodon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chickenlodon.
LanguageData.GR_MantistanisEggUnfertilized.label: mantistanis egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.GR_MantistanisEggUnfertilized.descriptio: Unfertilized mantistanis egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.GR_MantistanisEggFertilized.label: mantistanis egg (fert.)
LanguageData.GR_MantistanisEggFertilized.description: Fertilized mantistanis egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into a mantistanis.
